text: Sodom (known locally as Sudheim) is a settlement on Whalsay, Shetland.Google maps entry for Sodom, Shetland The name is a corruption of the Old Norse Suðheim meaning "south home". It was formerly the home of Hugh MacDiarmid, who was greatly amused at the anglicised form of the name. ==Footnotes== ==External links== *Scottish Places - Sudheim Category:Villages in Whalsay
title: Sodom, Shetland
